bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: In the late 18th century, Priscilla Hunt migrated with her sons from Fairfax County, Virginia, to Russell County. She died on 12 May 1822 in Russell County. Her children included Thomas Hunt, William Hunt, and Elizabeth Jackson.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: List of slaves, 1 April 1815, owned by Priscilla Hunt of Russell County, Virginia. Lists number, sex, age range, and monetary value. No slave names are recorded.
